metadata.title: CVE-2018-16883 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - low
metadata.description: sssd versions from 1.13.0 to before 2.0.0 did not properly restrict accessto the infopipe according to the "allowed_uids" configuration parameter. Ifsensitive information were stored in the user directory, this could beinadvertently disclosed to local attackers.

criterions.comment: sssd package in esm-infra/xenial is affected, but a decision has been made to defer addressing it.
